attributes.action: Allow children in any schools to take part in traditional and accurate Christmas Nativity plays rather than plays which have no meaning.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Isnt it about time that children were once again allowed to perform nativity plays in their schools at christmas?

I mean plays that acctually tell you the chirstmas story. I grew up at school with the Traditional Nativity play and no one was upset by it.

We are so politicaly correct now that we are afraid to perfom the story upon which christmas is based. 

Lets pull together and make school plays real again.
